channel.title: Pokemon X & Y
channel.description:
Not sure if any of you watched the Nintendo direct for it a few days ago, but it was first announced there.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WNr6wQfNfK4[/youtube]
Personally I think it looks extremely interesting, and due to being a huge pokemon fan I am really looking forward to it.
Thoughts?

item.title: Pokemon X & Y

item.description:

This actually looks really good! I jail broke my iPhone and have pokemon on it ahaha. Def gonna have to pick this up!
